US firms in China slightly more optimistic, but caution remains - surveyU.S. businesses in China are feeling more optimistic about bilateral relations and their profitability potential than a year ago, but most will still limit new investment in the country for now, a survey published on Thursday showed. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 00:08:44 GMT RLP3IOPIARJ4PIPMGGJG7XTLTM https://www.reuters.com/business/us-firms-china-slightly-more-optimistic-caution-remains-survey-2024-02-01/Casey Hall可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
Tesla to bring LFP battery supply chain to US - Bloomberg NewsTesla is expanding its battery facility in Sparks, Nevada to bring the supply chain for cheaper lithium iron phosphate batteries (LFP) to the United States, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 22:07:19 GMT LY7QAA423RMRVENZYTYJEUA4LE https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/tesla-bring-lfp-battery-supply-chain-us-bloomberg-news-reporter-2024-01-31/Reuters商业汽车与交通

US charges Chinese nationals with smuggling US-made electronics to IranU.S. authorities have charged four Chinese nationals with crimes related to the smuggling of U.S.-made electronic components, including some with possible military use, to Iran, the Justice Department said on Wednesday. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 17:41:30 GMT Q656PTG7FRI7XAHSWJW5FYVSJU https://www.reuters.com/world/us-charges-chinese-nationals-with-smuggling-us-made- electronics-iran-2024-01-31/Reuters世界
Swiss ban Russian diamond imports, joining latest EU sanctionsSwitzerland will ban the import of Russian diamonds in line with the latest round of European Union sanctions designed to punish Moscow for its invasion of Ukraine, the government said on Wednesday. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 17:31:34 GMT LIPVDVFME5JDHLVRNU7E5RTPD4 https://www.reuters.com/world/swiss-ban- Russian-diamond-imports-joining-latest-eu-sanctions-2024-01-31/Reuters世界
Pentagon calls out Chinese companies it says are helping Beijing's militaryThe United States on Wednesday added more than a dozen Chinese companies to a list created by the Defense Department to highlight firms it says are allegedly working with Beijing's military, as part of the broader effort to keep American technology from aiding China. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 16:13:33 GMT L4AO6LQLANNFZIQTGXHNLOU5GE https://www.reuters.com/technology/pentagon-adds-companies-chinese-military-list-us-official-says-2024-01-31/Idrees Ali, Alexandra Alper, Michael Martina技术
Netgear sues Huawei in US antitrust case over patent licensingComputer networking company Netgear has sued Huawei [RIC:RIC:HWT.UL] in California federal court, claiming the Chinese tech giant broke U.S. antitrust law by refusing to license its patents on reasonable terms. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 16:05:12 GMT O6RRASKRXVLORLXM3AMBU575SA https://www.reuters.com/legal/netgear-sues-huawei-us-antitrust-case-over-patent-licensing-2024-01-31/Blake Brittain合法的
South Africa says five countries confirm they are joining BRICSEgypt, Ethiopia, Iran, Saudi Arabia and the United Arab Emirates have confirmed they are joining the BRICS bloc after being invited last year, South Africa's Foreign Minister Naledi Pandor said on Wednesday. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 14:53:55 GMT MQ3UQGAF7JPIXO76YOXBEANW5M https://www.reuters.com/world/south-africa-says- Five-countries-confirm-they-are-joining-brics-2024-01-31/Reuters世界
Aviation lessor settlements with Russia over trapped planesAircraft leasing firms have secured settlements with Russia totalling more than $2.5 billion for over a quarter of the roughly 400 aircraft stuck in the country since Moscow's invasion of Ukraine in 2022. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 13:58:40 GMT 77FBFO4UCRJSJOIPH4Y5WMSZE https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/aviation-lessor-settlements-with-Russia-over-trapped-planes-2024-01-31/Reuters可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
India deploys unprecedented naval might near Red Sea to rein in piracyIndia has deployed at least a dozen warships east of the Red Sea to provide security against pirates and has investigated more than 250 vessels as Western powers focus on attacks by Yemen's Iran-backed Houthis, Indian officials said. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 13:20:50 GMT C253AANB3JKCDD4VJJE66JREVE https://www.reuters.com/world/india-deploys-unprecedented-naval-might-near-red-sea-rein-piracy-2024-01-31/Krishn Kaushik世界
German dealership Sternauto opens BYD store in BerlinChinese EV giant BYD's five models on sale in Germany will be showcased at a new BYD-only store in Berlin run by dealership Sternauto, in the latest sign that the carmaker is rapidly encroaching on European competitors' turf.
